text: , born was a Japanese actor. He was best known for his roles in Black Rain and in The Yakuza. He won the Japan Academy Prize four times, more than any other actor. He was born in Nakama, Fukuoka, Japan. Takakura died in Tokyo, Japan from lymphoma, aged 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from lymphoma Category:Cancer deaths in Japan Category:Japanese movie actors Category:Japanese television actors Category:Japanese stage actors Category:Japanese voice actors Category:Actors from Fukuoka Prefecture
title: Ken Takakura
